id.description: The unique identifier for the card.

object.description: Indicates the object type such as 'card'.

address_city.description: The city part of the cardholder's billing address.

address_country.description: The country part of the cardholder's billing address.

address_line1.description: The first line of the cardholder's billing address.

address_line1_check.description: If `address_line1` was provided, indicates if it has been checked for address_line1 true/false.

address_line2.description: The second line of the cardholder's billing address.

address_state.description: The state part of the cardholder's billing address.

address_zip.description: The ZIP or postal code of the cardholder's billing address.

address_zip_check.description: If `address_zip` was provided, indicates if it has been checked for address_zip true/false.

brand.description: The card brand such as Visa, Mastercard, etc.

country.description: The country where the card was issued.

cvc_check.description: If `cvc` was provided, indicates if it has been checked for cvc_check true/false.

dynamic_last4.description: The last 4 digits of the card number.

exp_month.description: The expiration month of the card.

exp_year.description: The expiration year of the card.

fingerprint.description: A unique identifier for the card created by Stripe.

funding.description: The funding source such as credit, debit, etc.

last4.description: The last 4 digits of the card number.

name.description: The cardholder's name as it appears on the card.

redaction.description: Indicates if the card has been redacted for security purposes true/false.

tokenization_method.description: The method used to tokenize the card such as apple_pay, google_pay, etc.

account.description: The ID of the Stripe account the card belongs to.

updated.description: Timestamp indicating when the card details were last updated.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the card has been deleted true/false.
